selection_reasoning: The selection balances the current top performer (trial_3_1) with diverse strategies from Generation 4, including inflation (4_0), smart perturbations (4_1), Differential Evolution (4_5), and Voronoi-based initialization (4_2). This mix aims to exploit the best-known configuration while exploring alternative geometric layouts.

trial_selections.reasoning: Overall best score (2.635977). Its multi-start basin-hopping approach with SLSQP is the most effective strategy found so far.
Best of the current generation (2.6317). The inflation strategy is a strong alternative to the basin-hopping of 3_1 and might reach the global optimum with more iterations.
Good performance (2.6293) with a custom perturbation logic that intelligently moves 'crowded' circles.
Differential Evolution approach (2.6283). Provides global search diversity and is robust against the local optima that plague gradient-based methods.
Voronoi/Lloyd's algorithm initialization (2.6167). Offers a fundamentally different geometric starting point compared to the grid-based initializations.
